Articles.Content: I used blender to made the 3d model of the engine that I\'m making (this is my first time trying to make a part for and game) I used the help to make a craft file. When I put it in the parts folder my engine doesn\'t show up at all. Do i need to make a basic texture or change the type of file of the blender 3d model?
What type of file is it currently? KSP uses .Dae . EDIT: Oh, and did you assign a material?

Im going to try that out.

that didn\'t work, I need to figure out how to do 3d models without blender

that didn\'t work, I need to figure out how to do 3d models without blender

Blender is OK, you just need to learn how to make a complete Blender model (with materials and textures) and export from Blender to game format.

Please have a look here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4032.0

Maraz
It took me a few tries to get it working. I still don\'t know shat about texturing tho. I got it all wrapped, etc etc, but I suck at actually drawing xD
